name: Advanced Combat Tracker Web UI Remodel
description: Restyles the web view of Advanced Combat Tracker.
additional_info:
Pretty shiny graphics that flash and rotate for viewing on a secondary screen. 

Note: This applies to all pages on a URL with an IP address with the path /current. This solution works, but it is, of course, a crapshoot as to whether it breaks anything else. 

v1: First release
